name: European Federation of Envelope Manufacturers
membership: we are supporters of the European Paper Recycling Council (http://www.paperrecovery.org/), of Two Sides (http://www.twosides.info/) and signed up to the interests of the Industry4Europe coalition
goal: To represent the interests of the European envelope manufacturing industry towards the EU institutions and to provide our members with EU and sector related information as well as to provide a platform for exchange on best practice and sector developments.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Data Protection Regulation
EU Ecolabel
Waste Directive
Consumer protection
Digital Agenda
Postal affairs
